title: BACK FROM VACATION! Raymundo Finally Proposed to Long-Time Girlfriend + Crystal Ball Show Predictions for 2020 + Bobby’s Mailbag: Husband Turns Into Baby When He’s Sick
itunes:title: BACK FROM VACATION! Raymundo Finally Proposed to Long-Time Girlfriend + Crystal Ball Show Predictions for 2020 + Bobby’s Mailbag: Husband Turns Into Baby When He’s Sick
description:
Raymundo came in with the biggest headline from the break…he finally proposed to his girlfriend of 6 years. He gives us all the details about how it went down. We take a look at the Bobby Bones Show Crystal Ball and predict things that will happen to everyone this year. We share all of our HIGH and LOWS from our vacation. Bobby went to Arkansas for the Razorbacks + Aggies Basketball game. Bobby also opens up the mailbag from a listener who is struggling with her husband who acts like a baby when he is sick.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
